description: Raise a glass to St. Patrick with this delicious Green Apple Cocktail! This recipe is simple, requiring just three ingredients and a garnish. This cocktail has a rich flavor that you won't find in your average&nbsp;apple martini. The best part about this drink? It's made with green apples instead of red ones, so it's perfect for celebrating St. Patrick's Day.
name: Green Dublin Apple

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine all ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine all ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until combined and chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well until combined and chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
